title: Microsoft Teams: New Teams calendar available to Education customers
description: The new calendar in Teams will be available to Education customers. The new calendar in Teams is designed to be familiar and reliable, as itâ€™s one unified calendar that works across new Outlook for Windows, Outlook on the web, Microsoft Places, and now Microsoft Teams. With this update, the new Teams calendar will be enabled by default, and users can turn it off from the "New calendar" toggle at the top right of the calendar app in Teams.
